para.text: MODFLOW has several packages that can be used to simulate subsidence due to groundwater withdrawal. At present, the only one supported in ModelMuse is the

is used for simulating the drainage, changes in groundwater storage, and compaction of aquifers, interbeds and confining units that constitute an aquifer system. Delays in the release of groundwater from interbed storage, and thus delays in aquifer-system compaction, can be simulated. Delayed drainage and compaction in confining units can also be simulated.
